name: metaphone
description: An implementation of the Metaphone algorithm by Lawrence Philips
author: Titus Wormer <tituswormer@gmail.com>

scripts.test-travis: node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks -u exports test.js
scripts.lint: npm run lint-api && npm run lint-test && npm run lint-benchmark && npm run lint-style
scripts.install-benchmark: npm install clj-fuzzy natural && git clone git@github.com:Katee/metaphone.git node_modules/metafone
scripts.make: npm run lint && npm run coverage
